staff.largeDesc:
ANNA SMITH

Director
annaSmith@lglab.com

This is the main text area for each staff, or anything you want to do with this module.

This text is HTML formated and imported dynamically from XML.

You can easlily insert external links, email links but also links to pages of this website such as the services page, all styled using CSS, embed images and swf etc...
